item.title: GameStop posts fifth straight quarterly profit, thanks to a big sales jump
item.description: OG meme stock reported a 22% rise in sales and a fifth consecutive profit, sending the stock more than 5% higher after hours Tuesday.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
